scripts.prepublish: echo '我要运行啦' && npm run build
scripts.mypub1: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.mypub2: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.mypub3: git add . && git commit -m '修复一些问题' && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m
